title.title: Portfolio
title.subTitle: Hello, My name is Goran and Webdevelopment is my passion
title.introduction: Welcome to  my homepage. Here you can find my projects. This site as well as my projects are still a work in progress but they will be updated frequently
projects.title: Projects
about.text1: I am an aspiring Webdeveloper, mainly focusing on Frontend solutions. With the help of the internet, books and friends I've been teaching myself how to develop Websites. Learning and improving are two essential things and I continuously try to become better at what I do. If you want to learn more about me or my projects & passion, feel free to check out my Github and Linkedin pages.
about.text2: Feel free to contact me via mail:
